column2: the food here is delicious. We found this place from Yelp reviews and word of mouth. We went on a Sunday at prime time and were told it was a 40 minute wait- long story short- 50 minutes later
column3: they seated people that came after us
column4: before us. When we brought this to their attention
column7: and comped our entire meal. THAT is what I call customer service. When you make a mistake (which was understandable but frustrating
column8: you make up for it. Because of that
column9: we would go back. The food was delicious. GET THE HASH BROWNS with cheese. Best hash browns I've ever had. The coffee is delicious too. Everything we had was amazing- but those hash browns.....get them!
